remarks: Relationship between multivariate Z-polynomials and general multivariate polynomial functions.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 20-Mar-2015.) Obsolete version of ~ mzpmfp as of 13-Jun-2019. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement: mzpmfpOLD $p |- ( mzPoly ` I ) = ran ( I eval ( CCfld |`s ZZ ) ) $.
